name: Senka Legend - Champion's Bravery at Changban Bridge
desc:
If your "Senka" monster battles, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Senka Legend - Champion's Bravery at Changban Bridge" per turn, and only once that turn.
● At the start of your opponent's Battle Phase: You can send this face-up card from the Spell & Trap Zone to the GY; your opponent's monsters cannot target "Senka" monsters for attacks this turn.
● When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Senka" monster from your Deck.
